transArray.content: The environment is good, the breakfast is rich, the service attitude is very good, the room is clean and comfortable, there is a robot to deliver food, and parking is convenient.

Dear guest, thank you very much for choosing Hanting and leaving us a review. We will continue our efforts and wholeheartedly provide you with high-quality services. Parking is available in our small courtyard and the surrounding transportation is convenient. It is less than two kilometers away from Beijing Chaoyang High-speed Railway Station and takes about 20 minutes to walk. Minutes later, the hotel has set up a free laundry room, food delivery robot, free reading area and tea area to provide value-for-money services for your travel.
